en.title: Receiving Exception Handling
en.guide_view: Click to view complete receiving info and item details
en.guide_process: Enter exception handling wizard and select correction strategy
en.guide_history: View processing history for this logistics

zh.page_desc: 管理订货单定金，查看付款状态，进行批量付款操作。
zh.batch_guide: 勾选待付款订单，点击「批量付款」进入付款向导；同一批次订单共享付款单号
zh.pmt_no_format: 格式 DPMT_YYYYMMDD_N##，可点击已付订单查看关联付款记录与回执
zh.deposit_calc: 定金费用 = 订单总金额 × 定金比例；支持多次分批付款
zh.confirm_rate: 确认结算汇率并完成定金付款。

en.page_desc: Manage purchase order deposits, view payment status, and perform batch payments.
en.batch_guide: Select unpaid orders and click 'Batch Payment' to enter payment wizard; orders in same batch share payment number
en.pmt_no_format: Format: DPMT_YYYYMMDD_N##. Click paid orders to view payment records and receipts
en.deposit_calc: Deposit = Total Amount × Deposit Rate; supports multiple partial payments
en.confirm_rate: Confirm settlement rate and complete deposit payment.

zh.page_desc: 管理订单尾款，查看付款状态，进行批量付款操作。
zh.payment_guide: 付款状态：已付清表示订单货款已结清，待付款表示仍有尾款待付
zh.history_guide: 点击订单行的「历史」按钮可查看策略、定金、货款的完整修订记录
zh.confirm_rate: 确认结算汇率并完成订单付款。

en.page_desc: Manage order balance payments, view payment status, and perform batch payments.
en.payment_guide: Payment Status: Paid means order payment completed; Unpaid means balance is due
en.history_guide: Click 'History' button on order row to view complete revision history of strategy, deposit, and payment
en.confirm_rate: Confirm settlement rate and complete order payment.

zh.title: 职能边界配置 (Capabilities)
zh.desc: 动态控制管理员 (Admin) 角色的操作权限。修改后即时生效，无需重启。
zh.admin_only: 此面板仅控制普通管理员的权限，Superuser 拥有所有权限不受此限制。
zh.audit_logged: 所有变更将记录在系统审计日志 (Audit Log) 中。
zh.restart_note: 系统重启后将按默认策略恢复配置（如需永久生效请联系系统管理员）。
zh.allow_create: 授权管理员创建新的登录账号。
zh.allow_lock: 授权管理员冻结违规账号。
zh.allow_reset_pwd: 授权管理员强制修改用户密码。
zh.allow_config_perms: 授权管理员修改用户的模块访问权限。
zh.allow_promote: 授权管理员晋升/降级普通用户。涉及权限提权。
zh.allow_delete: 授权管理员执行用户永久删除。

en.title: Role Capability Configuration
en.desc: Dynamically control Admin role operation permissions. Changes take effect immediately.
en.admin_only: This panel only controls regular Admin permissions. Superuser is not affected.
en.audit_logged: All changes are recorded in the Audit Log.
en.restart_note: System restart restores default configuration (contact sysadmin for permanent changes).
en.allow_create: Allow admin to create new login accounts.
en.allow_reset_pwd: Allow admin to force reset user passwords.
en.allow_config_perms: Allow admin to modify user module permissions.
en.allow_promote: Allow admin to promote/demote users. Involves privilege escalation.
en.allow_delete: Allow admin to permanently delete users.
